metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20357 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A NULL pointer dereference was discovered in sbr_process_channel of libfaad/sbr_dec.c in Freeware Advanced Audio Decoder 2 (FAAD2) 2.8.8. The vulnerability causes a segmentation fault and application crash.

criterions.comment: faad2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
